Title: Mentat is soooo much better than when I was trying to build llm-chat with it in the fall. I came bac...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: Mentat is soooo much better than when I was trying to build llm-chat with it in the fall. I came back to a PR that it couldn't get to pass CI in ~11 attempts and asked it to try again and it got it on the first try.
